steps: step 3: Click on link productCategories (CategoryApple) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 4: Click on link productDetails (ProductIPhone15FineWovenCase) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
step 7: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
step 8: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 11: Enter input value in input Email
step 13: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 14: Click on link CheckoutBackToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
step 18: Fill out shipping information and complete order
step 19: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
